#summary setBorder(boolean)

= setBorder(boolean) =

== Description ==

This method turns on and off the border for the cell.  This method assumes pre-configured values for the border width, color, and style.  If you want to change any of these, you can use the methods [setBorderWidth], [setBorderColor], and [setBorderStyle].

== Arguments ==

The value must be either True or False

== Return Value ==

The cell object at the specified location is returned.

== Example ==
{{{
doc = odslib.ODS()
cell = doc.content.getCell(1, 3)
cell.setBorder(True)
}}}
